reviews.review_text: I am not a burger person. That being said this is one of the best burger places out there. This place has been recommended to me by almost all Vancouver natives. Rightly so. Amazing burgers. Best part, they don t force you to buy fries with your burger. Their chicken sandwich burger is one of my favorites. Definitely going back again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We are glad you had a great experience!!  See you again soon!!

reviews.review_text: I loved this place after a long night out! It s a pretty cool space because it also acts as an entrance to a nice bar. The burgers were fantastic. I wish they had more seatings space but a lot of people were doing takeouts. I recommend the chicken sandwich and the cheeseburger.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review, Scott.   Were glad you had a great experience with us. See you soon!

reviews.review_text: Open until very late! Went around 1215AM and didnt expect anything amazing as there was no customers there, and only one person was working. The food took a while to come out but the chicken sandwich and burger was so juicy and delicious! Sauce is super good too. Little overpriced, $4 for can of pop, but was worth it. There is a bar downstairs and you can hear and feel the vibration of the music when you are eating. It was quite loud.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review. Were glad to hear you enjoyed it!

reviews.review_text: The first time my boyfriend and I came here was July 31 (after someone came up to us in the park and gave us a coupon) and weve been hooked ever since!! The burgers are fresh, delicious, and the fries are always crispy and good. The atmosphere is super aesthetic ~ I do wish that there was more seating in the Hundy area (instead of a giant yellow pole) without having to go into the speakeasy The Stockroom. But this isnt that big of an issue as the burgers stay fresh when you take them to go as well! Very yum!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review, Sophia.   Im glad you had a great experience with us, give it a try to our feature next time.  We hope to see you guys soon!!

reviews.review_text: Love this place! Their crispy chicken sandwich and fries are to die for.  You can get the burgers to go from hundy or if you want a sit down option I recommend booking a table at the stockroom so you can enjoy the food in a nice atmosphere.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Jumana, thank you for taking the time to leave a review. See you again soon!!

reviews.review_text: Did not expect a burger place like this! The bacon cheeseburger was delicious, as were the fries. The interior is really nicely decorated and the staff are incredibly friendly and helpful. I didnt even know there was a bar attached as well. Definitely a must try.

After two unsuccessful attempts to try and eat here (1st time they were way too busy, 2nd time was told they were out of burger buns)..we made the drive once again from Surrey to try this place out. I m so glad we did. The cheeseburger was phenomenal, the hot chicken sandwich was amazing. Everything tasted fresh. The fries were nice, crispy and salted. It definitely is on the  higher end  price wise but it s very very good. Will definitely come back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review, Claudia.   Im glad you had a great experience with us. See you soon!

reviews.review_text: Yummy! Finally got around to trying this place and it did not disappoint. My favourite was the Nashville hot chicken, friend loved the bacon cheeseburger (not my favorite but still the best burger Ive had in years!). But wait . . . then theres the crazy good donuts: we had the mochi donut (chewy perfection) and the breakfast cruller (great cruller!). The shop itself is beautiful and the staff are great. Certainly will go again

We frequently order from this spot and have dined at the sister restaurants. Honestly, the food is consistently incredible and the service I receive from the young woman up at the front (her name escapes me) is fantastic. Notwithstanding my praises, the venue located in the back could use some coaching when it comes to service  falls beneath the brand standard set by the sister restaurants and the front of the venue.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your review, Kyle! We hope to see you soon!

reviews.review_text: Ray was the most amazing server I have everrrrr. She was so so attentive and the vibes were immaculate. She MADE the experience here 10/10
Nice burger (Bacon Cheeseburger) acording to my friend the chicken one was average.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review, Marc.  We hope to see you soon!!

reviews.review_text: They have probably the best burgers Ive had in Vancouver! Very friendly staff and atmosphere. And creative hidden little bar inside Good job Food : 5/5
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review, Macy. Were glad you had a great experience with us. We hope to see you soon!

reviews.review_text: Its as good as it gets! For the win! Hope theres a bigger place for dine-in.
Great for a quick snack. The food is delish, the staff is very friendly and the music is always good. The chicken sandwich and the bacon cheese burger are both 10/10!!

Craving late night comfort food after a very long exhausting week, I was so happy this place is open till midnight, and the cheeseburger I ordered really hit the spot! Also, a shout out to  Alayna, whose friendly and professional demeanour added an extra touch of excellence to the experience.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your review, Nicole!! We hope to see you soon!!

reviews.review_text: Wow just had an amazing hot chicken sandwich, they have friendly staff in a inviting atmosphere, a great place with delicious food, definitely a must try

Updated Review: I visited them again and spoke to the manager who was very gracious and heard my concerns. I ordered my usual double patty bacon cheeseburger. The taste was balanced and the patties perfectly cooked. Do try the cabbage peanut salad. Hope to see this consistency throughout my future visits! Old Review: The burger is decent, feels a pricey for the size Id still give it four stars if it wasnt so inconsistent over multiple visits. Flavours are on and off. And the patties have got a bit smaller as well.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Abhishek, sorry to hear about your experience. Please email us at manny@hundy.ca We want to follow up and make it up to you on your next visit.

reviews.review_text: Ate here during the dine out Vancouver festival. The best Chicken sandwich I have ever had in my life. No joke, as soon as I took my first bite, there was this explosive juiciness and perfect flavors mixed with heat. It exceeded my expectations throughout. Can t remember the last time I had this much satisfaction from food. Thoroughly enjoyed the cabbage salad as well. Definitely would come back.
Great place. Great service. Everything on menu was fantastic. Check the pics. We had veggie burgers, chicken burgers and double cheeseburger. The poutine was great but cabbage salad was my fave.

Loved the cheeseburger! Fries were great too, if it were open more often I would be there constantly, but only open on weekend nights when Im always working. Still doesnt hurt the score, burger and fries are that good. Great craft beers on tap, small selection but good.
One of Vancouvers best burger joints for smash burgers. I forgot my backpack in the terrasse and the friendly staff kept it for me and returned a few hours later. Life savers! Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review, Jose!! We hope to see you soon!!

reviews.review_text: Love their spicy chicken burger   owner is also very kind and fries are fresh and taste amazing with hundy sauce
Forget about all the  gourmet burgers  of this world, HUNDY is the place to go!! Simply the best cheeseburger(s) I ve ever had. If only Vancouver wasn t that far from home
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review, Olivier!! We hope to see you next time you visit Vancouver!!

reviews.review_text: One, if not the best burger in Vancouver, is really good and tasty! Only problem is the limited seats in location.

Hundy has been on my radar since their soft opening. I sat at home watching their instagram stories of people snapping photos of their burgers and fries. Yesterday night, I had enough, it was time to try out Hundy. First impressions, the music playlist really sets the vibe of the whole place. I love how they converted this place into a restaurant at night and a coffee shop by day. I also like that the take my phone number and text me when my table is ready approach. It s a counter service restaurant (like PDX restaurants) so while we waited for our table we ordered beers. Their beers are constantly changing but I had the Farmhouse 33 Acres experiment beer and it was amazing. It s a very refreshing IPA without too many hops and fruity flavours. Alright, 4th paragraph in, I should start talking about the food. I ordered the bacon cheese burger with fries. The sauce in the burger is what makes this burger amazing. It s hard to explain what it is, but their secret sauce is boss. Bun, patty, veg, and cheese were all great sidekicks in this burger. But, the true Robin to the Batman were the fries. These fries  their like my crown jewel of fries  places like Cockney Kings and other OG fish and chips places. You think you come here for the burger, but when you leave  the fries are what you think about. My buddy Bryan ordered the bacon poutine with a chicken burger. I tried the poutine and must say it was worth the $7. As for his review of the chicken burger, he said,  I ll be back. . Once I posted the pics on IG, the DMs exploded with,  How was it?   Is the hype real?
I really like Hundy s Burguer. It is simple and tasty. For the first time we went to the bar on the back. It is a great experience, the staff were nice and the service was good.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review, Caroline!! We hope to see you soon!!

reviews.review_text: I had the beef brisket sandwich and a bunch of tots and, my oh my, was I happy with choice. Great staff too. Neat little shop attached. Definitely would go back.

Great burgers, but get there early or be ready to wait! We got there about quarter to 6 before they open and there were about 10ish people in line. The staff are very friendly (we had a baby stroller with us) and found us a convenient place to sit. The burgers were delicious. We didnt try the fries  because they happened to be having a poutine special that night, so we ordered two of those instead of fries. Absolutely delicious. We didnt need to wait long since we got there a bit early, but be prepared to because the line didnt shorten at all the entire time we were there. But the burgers will absolutely be worth the wait! Its too bad theyre only open two nights a week.

Very nice hidden bar attached to what looks like a basic takeout place when you first walk in. Great space, some excellent drinks, and the burgers were good too. Not cheap but thats what you get for going out in Yaletown :) definitely recommend finding your way into the back and trying the cocktails.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We appreciate your feedback!

reviews.review_text: Prompt service, great quality at a fair price. One of my favorite burger joints in the city.
Delicious burger and fries! There vegetarian burger is awesome! I also love that you can order Hundys from the Stockroom!

Got some Hundy and took it to Jericho and it did not disappoint!! Get the TOTS they are delicious! They have great covid protocols in place as well. Okay and we got a donut. And I wasn t expecting anything amazing BUT it was SOOOO GOOOOOD. Go to Hundy for the burgers but come back for the donuts!?! For reals. I can t stop thinking about it. I was already full and then tried the donut. And. It. Was. So. Amazing.
Awesome place, huge burgers, they have a homemade veggie burger which is amazing. Great prices and great beer too. Awesome atmosphere. Poutine is average.
This is by far the best burger you can uberE in downtown west end area, dont get the chicken (Everyone can be better: a tad more hundy sauce and 86 the chicken)

great quality burgers. it tastes so good and one burger can get you full really fast! my friend struggled to finish her fries since it was so filling. also, aesthetics here are amazing with kind staff

Absolutely amazing. Top quality burgers and staff. We called 30 min before closing for take out and they demanded we eat there and enjoy the food. The outstanding service is matched by the life changing burgers and great atmosphere. I love this place one hundy%
Fantastic hamburgers and sandwiches. Fries are done proper. Didnt quite like the kimchi poutine. Phenomenal beer and wine list, especially for a burger joint/cafe. A tad pricey.
Great tasting food. Ordered the hot chicken sandwich and the side salad. The inside of the restaurant had a mix of a coffee/wine/dessert place vibe.

I eat out a lot and this place has the best burger in Vancouver (MAYBE tied with the American) but yeah their bacon cheese burger is amazing, the fries are good and they give you lots of pickles which I love. And they re really nice!!

Pretty good burger   I had the cheeseburger and I was happy with it. A friend got the veggie burger and apparently it was also good. We ordered the fries with the hundy sauce. The hundy sauce was weirdly sweet compared to the  secret sauce  at other restaurants I ve been to - not sure if I would order it again.

Best chicken burger Ive ever had. Poutine is near the top as well, the gravy is intense, not the same profile as what youd find in Quebec but intense in a different way. Hard to describe but like Costco gravy condensed slightly with a sprinkle of magic.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review. Were glad to hear you enjoyed it.

reviews.review_text: Visited this Yaletown spot last night before heading out with some friends, and we had a great time! The burgers were simple but solid (the way a burger should be), and the staff was super friendly- which similar hipster burger joints dont really offer customers. I especially want to give a shout out to Alayna who took care of us and was the perfect guide through the experience. She made fantastic suggestions and had made us feel looked after. Give her a raise!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review, Mark. Were glad you had a great experience with us. We hope to see you and your friends soon!

reviews.review_text: Amazing crispy and juicy chicken burger even after takeout in a bag. Size of the burger was great! Will be back for dine out next time!
Had the fried chicken burger. Excellent fried chicken burger. Wish they had a bit more seasoning but besides that i highly recommend that place.

Excellent service. My server Alayna was very nice and funny. She seemed like she knew what she was doing, and was quite attentive. The food was about 8/10. the fries could have been crispier but, the burger was a solid 9/10. I will 100% will be going here again with my friends!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review, Ethan. Im glad you had a great experience with us. We hope to see you and your friends soon!

reviews.review_text: I heard about Hundy not too long ago and decided to try it out yesterday. I stopped by their location on Homer street in Yaletown. The restaurant is small but prominent. Inside the seating is bar style along the window with stools and a couple of tables and chairs outside, a very clean establishment inside and out. I ordered from Dave who was great. He explained what they offered and also made suggestions and pondered mixing and match sauces with us. I ordered the fried chicken sandwich with the Hundy sauce and a poutine. We didn t have to wait long and they provide you with a buzzer so you know when your order is ready. I was amazed with the food and absolutely loved it. I have not had a great sandwich like this in a long time. Prices are not bad and the experience is straightforward order, eat, enjoy. Then come back again. I know I ll be back. Nice job Hundy. See you soon!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review, Ridhwaan Im glad you had a great experience with us. As you said, come back again!!!

reviews.review_text: Only open on weekends at night only. The wait time was 45 mins cause we had 6 people. But it was worth it! The burger was delicious and filling.
Small menu, delicious burgs and sandwiches. Even though it looks like it, its not a fast food joint. Make an order, grab that buzzer, and sit to enjoy a scrumpdilly, hot chicken sandwich.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review, Mark.  We appreciate your feedback and are glad you had a great experience!!

reviews.review_text: The food was amazing and Alayna has to be the second most amazing person Ive ever met. I will be returning soon and Hundy is a new favorite.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We appreciate your feedback and are glad you had a great experience!! (Just curious about the first one lol)

reviews.review_text: Very good good burgers, the cocktail bar is pretty cool as well.
The burgers are a must try! The Fries are also top notch. Cool atmosphere. Would come back
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We appreciate your feedback and are glad you had a great experience!! See you again soon!!

reviews.review_text: One of the best burger places in Vancouver! I always get this as a treat. My favourite is the hot chicken sandwich      Excellent quality and decent portions.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review, were glad you had a great experience with us. See you soon!

reviews.review_text: Eleyna was so nice!!! she helped me pick what to get but i didn t feel pressured to eat there. she was nice :) the food was so so yummy too. i even got a second one. i had the chicken sandwich, there was some more lettuce then i would ve liked but it was still awesome

Honestly, at first I was apprehensive to go because I thought the burgers were overpriced. But after eating a bacon cheeseburger and fries, Im happy I went. The food tasted great (I prefer on the salty side, so it was perfect for me) and the service was even better. Will be back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review.   Im glad you had a great experience with us. See you soon!

reviews.review_text: I had a bacon cheeseburger and cabbage salad. Burger was a good size and tasted great. the salad was simple but delicious and crispy.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review.  Were glad you had a great experience with us. See you soon!

reviews.review_text: Great burger shop!! Had a cheese bacon burger. The veges are nice and fresh, patty is so juicy, and everything goes really well together. Love the interior deco and Friendly staffs too :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review, Kota.   Im glad you had a great experience. Hope youll be back again soon!!!

reviews.review_text: Heard a lot about this place, came to check it out and gotta say it was one of the best burgers I ve had. I definitely recommend the hot chicken sandwich.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review.  Were glad you had a great experience with us. See you soon!

reviews.review_text: Interesting place. Good cocktail lounge in the back and some simple yet deliciously crushable burgers in the front. You can order all food from the cocktail lounge if you want to sit and imbibe, or you can just crush some burgers out front. Dealers choice.

Love the burger. Love the service,the seating, the store. The fries were on point with proper seasonings and crispiness. The burger was so satisfying! They also had good wines, beers for sale or dining in. Just a cool joint overall! Can t wait to return again!
Hands down best burgers in downtown feature sandwiches are a must have.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review, Mahyar. We are glad you had a great experience with us.  New feature soon!

reviews.review_text: I went here on a whim. I was having a bad day and didn t feel very good, I just wanted something to eat. Yet walking in I was greeted with a smiling face and a friendly person. Alayna was the coolest person I could ve seen after the day I had. The food was great too. I left with a smile and a full stomach

This must be Vancouvers best burger. I wouldnt believe you if you said there was a better classic style smashed bacon cheeseburger. Worth lining up for. I have been everywhere in America and this Burger channels the best of the best in its authenticity and flavor. I have to go back for the Nashville chicken just to see how that sandwich is. I have high expectations after my burger today. I dont doubt it will be fantastic as well. **tried the Nashville sando, delicious chicken, great flavor, lots of bread-butter pickles** TOP NOTCH SMASHBURGER AMERICAN CHEESE GOOD THICK BACON
alayna was super helpful on helping us pick what to order after she found out it was my roomate and i s first time here. very sociable, also the burger was very bomb!! would come back
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review, Alexa.  Were glad to hear you enjoyed it!

reviews.review_text: great burger and great fries. get here a little early so you can skip the lines. If you get here late, dont worry the burger is great.

The burger is so good I m still giving it five stars; despite the pedestrian amount of gravy on the poutine best burger in Vancouver. **Update: Hundy apparently listened to misinformed Karen s complaining about  too much sauce? Burgers last night were dry AF. Don t listen to the haters Hundy.

Omg, the burgers were amazing.When I walked up to the counter to be seated I was greeted with a kind smile, I belive her name was Alayna i think, and she was very kind, if you go here i recommend their burgers, that is what I ordered and it was great. Kid-friendliness: My son is usually a shy person, but the person at the front desk was so kind to him, her name was Alayna and I hope she is as kind to you as she was to my son and I.

Had a great time trying out their cocktails last night. The two bartenders Stephen and Scott were really great, putting up with our ridiculous questions and making some really solid drinks. Will definitely go again!
Delicious juicy burgers. Cool vibes and free arcade!
Alayna at the front was the sweetest girl!!! Super helpful and smiley, greatest burger my friends and I have ever had. 10/10 will recommend to everyone I know
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the review, Hannab.  We hope youll be back again soon!

reviews.review_text: Hundy burger is a great experience. from The amazing atmosphere to the amazing food its always a pleasurable time to come and stop by.  My favorite dish would have to be the Nashville style hot chicken sandwich.  If youre thinking of trying this place its worth a shot you shouldnt be disappointed leaving here.
Fresh, delicious, good value. Love both the beef and chicken burger. Fries are pretty good, well seasoned. Great music, vibe and friendly employees.
I ve come in a few times and love the bacon cheese burger. The girl up front, Elana, always greets me with a smile She s super sweet and kind :3 honestly 10/10 would recomend
Food was great. Awesome curated selection of pops which was cool. Alayna helped us out and was awesome. Will be back next time visiting Van for sure
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the review, Jelena.   We hope youll be back again soon!

reviews.review_text: I have by now tasted your entire menu. The bun is really letting the burgers down, please use this as constructive feedback. You should offer the chicken strips used in the burger by its own with the Hundy sauce. Keep up the good work !!

I really dig the atmosphere and aesthetic of this place. The servers were really chill and friendly to talk to. The burger was delicious and the fries were quite tasty as well. Theyve got a little outdoor area set up right on the street as well which is awesome. Highly recommend this place.
Live this place, cool vibes and great atmosphere. Oh food is excellent as well. Love the breakfast burgers.
Amusing decor and delicious burgers, place is a vibe definitely going back!
this place gives me life, i love it !! delicious burger and i love how it s hidden
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We are glad you had a great experience!!

reviews.review_text: At the moment, Im pretty confident that this is the best burger and fries in the city. Very simple menu, cool atmosphere, small but good selection of craft beers and sodas. Expect a wait on a weekend if youre not early, and keep in mind that take-out is an option.

Simple burgers done excellently. The menu is small but each item is done to perfection at a price thats lower than your average lousy pub burger. Which is great, because they also have a surprisingly wide selection of beers for a place thats a cafe during the daytime. Without a doubt, the best burger in Kitsilano (if not the city) right now. (Try the Hundy Burger if they have it when you go!)

One of the best burgers in town! An original take on the classic burger. Really tasty and loved the soft brioche bun. Friendly customer service and great vibe. Well done! I ll definitely be returning.
Alayna is the best. Honestly. We will come back for the food and to see her. So cool and friendly. Overall great vibes.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review, Mel.   Were glad you had a great experience with us. See you soon!

reviews.review_text: Good food great service theres a speak easy in the back with good drinks and a cool atmosphere
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Kris. We appreciate your feedback and are glad you had such a great experience!

reviews.review_text: Favorite burger place in Vancouver. The actual restaurant portion was really cool and had a great vibe.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Josh!

reviews.review_text: The food was delicious! The server Alayna was very helpful, and she helped me decide to chose the cheese bacon burger - it was amazing.

~ SIMPLY THE BEST ~ I went to HUNDY to try their Veggie Burger last week and it blew my mind. Eveything about it was perfect (bun, patty, sauce, etc). And let s be honest, veggie burgers aren t always very tasty, but here it was. Actually the entire place was perfect, truly charming and comfy. Doesn t look like any restaurant I have been before. The staff was also extremely friendly. Real crush here !! I ABSOLUTELY recommend. PS : I would have asked google to add a 6th   if they had a Caesar salad on the menu.
Great burger great price !
Great quick grab burger spot and worth checking out. Also has a little hidden spot in the back if you want more than a beer!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the review. We hope youll be back again soon!

reviews.review_text: Burgers were amazing and the service was great! Alayna and Nate were super nice and friendly at the counter and gave us our stuff super fast.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review, Rodrigo.   See you soon!

reviews.review_text: Came here for the very first time and had an outstanding experience. Staff was awesome and made some delicious suggestions. Appreciate the energy from Alicia and Jade especially (sorry if I spelled wrong!)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review, Zaid. Im glad you had a great experience with us. We hope to see you soon!

reviews.review_text: Hands down the best burgers in the City. Only complaint was that the fries weren t fresh.

Well, it is impossible to eat a proper burger with thick, juicy, medium-raw patty in Vancouver, we all know that. Let s say at Hundy, it is beyond Vancouver standards. So my 5 stars go to the excellent vibe, awesome staff and great ingredients. The place could be even more fantastic if more people hang around standing with their drinks and maybe a little bit of dancing!
Alayna was amazing! Five star service every time and the special sandwich was killer
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We are glad you had a great experience!!

reviews.review_text: Went here to try out the bacon cheese burger and it was amazing 10/10, great service and the girl there named Alayna was very nice. 10/10 resturant in Vancouver, will be going again :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review, Andrew. Im glad you had a great experience with us. We hope to see you soon!

reviews.review_text: The food here was so delicious and priced very reasonably, And the staff was soooooo amazing! Alayna was so polite and helpful, 10/10 should give a raise, We will be stopping again when back in town.
Thank you to Alayna for the amazing service. The food was great and will definitely be back for more!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We appreciate your feedback and are glad you had a great experience!!

reviews.review_text: Was looking for a different burger place and that was closed walked here, was very impressed! Best burger Ive had in a long long time! Worth the wait and the walk or train trip!

Burgers were just amazing! Fries were crispy salted and fresh. The whole interior of the restaurant is very cool. However drinks could be little bit cheaper. It is defo worth a visit, you will not be disapointed!
Pulled pork was top tier, as was the fried chicken. Wash it down with some Boylans and youre set!
Great place with great craft beer and a very nice burger. Crowd is mixed but mostly on the younger side. Not pretentious, everyone will feel welcome. Heading back when the next burger craving hits.
